com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models

Class EventHubProducerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.models.EventHubProducerOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class EventHubProducerOptions
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    The set of options that can be specified when creating an EventHubAsyncProducer to configure its behavior.
    See Also:
    EventHubAsyncProducer, EventHubAsyncClient.createProducer(EventHubProducerOptions)

      String getPartitionId()
      Gets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition.
      RetryOptions getRetry()
      Gets the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
      EventHubProducerOptions setPartitionId(String partitionId)
      Sets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventHubProducerOptions

        public EventHubProducerOptions()

    • Method Detail

      • setPartitionId

        public EventHubProducerOptions setPartitionId(String partitionId)
        Sets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition. If the identifier is not specified, the Event Hubs service will be responsible for routing events that are sent to an available partition.
        Parameters:
        partitionId - The identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to. If the producer wishes the events to be automatically to partitions, null; otherwise, the identifier of the desired partition.
        Returns:
        The updated EventHubProducerOptions object.

      • setRetry

        public EventHubProducerOptions setRetry(RetryOptions retry)
        Sets the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Parameters:
        retry - The retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Returns:
        The updated SenderOptions object.

      • getRetry

        public RetryOptions getRetry()
        Gets the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending.
        Returns:
        the retry options used to govern retry attempts when an issue is encountered while sending. If null, then the retry options configured on the associated EventHubAsyncClient is used.

      • getPartitionId

        public String getPartitionId()
        Gets the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to, limiting it to sending events to only that partition. If the identifier is not specified, the Event Hubs service will be responsible for routing events that are sent to an available partition.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the Event Hub partition that the EventHubAsyncProducer will be bound to.

        public EventHubProducerOptions clone()
        Creates a clone of this instance.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
        Returns:
        A shallow clone of this object.
